data.name: ksCannotFindHelp
data.value: The help file could not be located.

data.name: ksNoHelpTopicX
data.value: The help topic is not available for topic: {0}

data.name: kstidCm
data.comment: Measurement unit abbreviation for Centimeters (Localized string should preserve leading space if needed in formatted display.)

data.name: kstidIn
data.comment: Measurement unit abbreviation for Inches (Localized string should preserve leading space if needed in formatted display.)

data.name: kstidInches
data.comment: Measurement unit symbol for Inches (If culture doesn't have a separate symbol for specifying inches, localized value for this string should be set to match value of kstidIn.)

data.name: kstidMm
data.comment: Measurement unit abbreviation for Millimeters (Localized string should preserve leading space if needed in formatted display.)

data.name: kstidPt
data.comment: Measurement unit abbreviation for Points (Localized string should preserve leading space if needed in formatted display.)

data.name: ksChangeFailed
data.comment: Caption for dialog reporting failure to update.

data.name: ksRegChangeFailed
data.value: You do not have permission to change the setting "{0}". Administrator privileges are required to make changes affecting all users of this computer.
data.comment: Error message when writing a registry setting for "local machine" fails.

data.name: kstIdCantDoDictExists
data.value: FieldWorks has unexpectedly timed out trying to determine whether the spelling dictionary {0} exists. FieldWorks will assume there is no such dictionary, which may affect spell-checking. If you think this dictionary should exist, we recommend restarting your computer. If you see this message regularly, please report it as a bug.

data.name: kstidInvalidDictId
data.value: The writing system {0} specifies an invalid spelling dictionary ({1}). Valid spelling dictionary IDs must only contain ASCII alphanumeric characters or underline. Spell checking will not work for this writing system until you correct this in the Writing System Properties dialog.
data.comment: Error message. {0} might be a code like "fr" and {1} a bad ID, typically a short string like "frn[".

data.name: ksDeleteAndReportCorruptSettingsFile
data.value: FieldWorks has detected one or more corrupted settings files. These files will be safely deleted. If you have been using different keyboards to input text, these may be reset to default values. Please restore them yourself.
data.comment: Let users know that local user settings need to be manually restored

data.name: ksPtCommunicationProblem
data.value: The project you are opening will not communicate with Paratext because a project with the same name is already open. If you want to use Paratext with this project, make a change in this project (so that it will start first), close both projects, then restart FLEx.

data.name: kstidAppVersionFmt
data.comment: Displays in the Help/About box and the splash screen

data.name: kstidLicense
data.value: This software is licensed under the LGPL, version 2.1 or later
data.comment: Displays in the Help/About box and the splash screen

data.name: kstidMajorVersionFmt
data.comment: Displays in the Help/About box and the splash screen
